::Hot Rod/Epyon/Prowl/Skyburst::

They scatter avoiding the fire balls.

"Oh great, two of them!" Yells Hot Rod.

Prowl steps up.
"Why do you two dragon's still fight? The bot who seemed to be your
leader has retreated. You should do the same. Continueing this battle is
useless."
